summary: With my recent move to the Netherlands I am looking to make my next career step. With over nine years experience working in Project Management and Communication Strategy in various countries with different cultures and customs, I have developed a versatile skill-set. I am able to coordinate multi-disciplinary teams as well as providing client service delivery by negotiating and consulting with internal and external partners to develop productive partnerships.
